game

Class Zombie

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      • game.ZombieActor
        • game.Zombie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Capable, Printable, ActorInterface

    public class Zombie
extends ZombieActor
    A Zombie. This Zombie is pretty boring. It needs to be made more interesting.
    Author:
    ram

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void accountForLostArm(GameMap map)
      When a zombie loses an arm, he has a slight chance to drop weapons he is holding When a zombie loses both of his arms, he can no longer carry weapons and must drop them all
      void accountForLostLeg(GameMap map)
      When a zombie loses one leg, he is only able to walk at half of his original speed When a zombie loses both legs, he is now unable to move at all
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> dropLimbs(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> limbsDropped, GameMap map)
      Causes zombie to lose a limb at random If a zombie at least has both an arm and a leg, then there exists a 50% chance to an arm and 50% chance to lose a leg.
      IntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()
      Creates and returns an intrinsic weapon.
      Location getLocationToSpawnLimb(GameMap map)
      This allows us to determine which locations next to a zombie can an item be dropped to Multiple items may be dropped onto the one location on the map When a human/player walks near it, it will have the option to select which weapon to pick up

      An arm is one of the limbs that the zombie can lose
      void loseLeg(GameMap map)
      A leg is one of the limbs that the zombie can lose

    • Method Detail

      • getIntrinsicWeapon

        public IntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()
        Description copied from class: Actor
        Creates and returns an intrinsic weapon. By default, the Actor 'punches' for 5 damage. Override this method to create an Actor with more interesting descriptions and/or different damage.
        Returns:
        a freshly-instantiated IntrinsicWeapon

      • playTurn

        public Action playTurn(Actions actions,
                       Action lastAction,
                       GameMap map,
                       Display display)
        If a Zombie can attack, it will. If not, it will chase any human within 10 spaces. If no humans are close enough it will wander randomly.
        Specified by:
        playTurn in class Actor
        Parameters:
        actions - list of possible Actions
        lastAction - previous Action, if it was a multiturn action
        map - the map where the current Zombie is
        display - the Display where the Zombie's utterances will be displayed
        Returns:
        the Action to be performed

      • pickUpWeapons

        public void pickUpWeapons(Actions actions,
                          GameMap map)
        If a Zombie is standing on an weapon, then the PickUpItemAction would be executed and the weapon would be placed into the zombie's inventory. The Zombie can now use the weapon instead of punches/bites.
        Parameters:
        actions - list of possible Actions
        map - the map where the current Zombie is

      • tryToDropLimbs

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tryToDropLimbs(GameMap map)
        When a zombie is attacked, there is a chance that it may drop some of its limbs as weapons for humans/player to pick up and use
        Parameters:
        map - the map where the current Zombie is
        Returns:
        limbsDropped an ArrayList of strings of the limbs the zombie has dropped

      • dropLimbs

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> dropLimbs(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> limbsDropped,
                                                       GameMap map)
        Causes zombie to lose a limb at random If a zombie at least has both an arm and a leg, then there exists a 50% chance to an arm and 50% chance to lose a leg. If a zombie does not have an arm or it does not have a leg, then there exists a 100% chance for the zombie to simply drop the limb it still possesses.
        Parameters:
        limbsDropped - an ArrayList of strings of the limbs the zombie has dropped
        map - the map where the current Zombie is
        Returns:
        limbsDropped an ArrayList of strings of the limbs the zombie has dropped

      • loseArm

        public void loseArm(GameMap map)
        An arm is one of the limbs that the zombie can lose
        Parameters:
        map - the map where the current Zombie is

      • loseLeg

        public void loseLeg(GameMap map)
        A leg is one of the limbs that the zombie can lose
        Parameters:

      • getLocationToSpawnLimb

        public Location getLocationToSpawnLimb(GameMap map)
        This allows us to determine which locations next to a zombie can an item be dropped to Multiple items may be dropped onto the one location on the map When a human/player walks near it, it will have the option to select which weapon to pick up
        Parameters:
        map - the map where the current Zombie is
        Returns:
        locationOfLimb the randomly selected location to spawn the dropped limb
